Action.author: oussmea
Action.body: hello Sir , what I see in the function channel.getOrganisations() that this function returns all the msp_id from the msp_manager. Here the msp_manager belong to this channel , so the msp_manager will return all the msp_id of all the organisations belong to this channel. As those organisations participate to this channel by a peer or an orderer , the channel.Organisations() will return the msp_ids of the peers and the orderers that the organisations of this channel participate with
